topic.title: Site user data doesn't want to sync
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: 0.6.0 rev3179
  * Operating system: w10 1607
  * Web browser: currently Iridium, but other browsers show same results
  * Tor status: doesn't seem to matter, currently as "available"
  * Opened port: doesn't seem to matter, currently "opened" (opened in router settings)
  * Special configuration: none that I'm aware of/that counts as special

### Step 2: Describe the problem:

Site data from [site id]/data/users/[user id]/*" doesn't want to sync

#### Steps to reproduce:

1. Send a letter thru zeromail to echbot/upload a song to ZeroLTSN

#### Observed Results:

 * Zeromail: No reply from echo bot
 * ZeroLTSN: No one gets the uploaded songs from me
 * Common: sync error/missing file "data.json or content.json in data/users/[user id]/

#### Expected Results:

 Everything should work fine (and works for others I've asked).

1604066302_mirrored_rKsanu2MMYvypWePtQWM.body: I've tried to send the message at least once a month for the last year. No answer. Also real people never received any letters from me as well.
